languages.text: "Теперь я готов{mf||а} поговорить о твоей любопытной инфопластине в моих покоях".
"I am ready to talk now about the intriguing contents of your data-slate — in my quarters."
languages.original_text: "Теперь я готов{mf||а} поговорить о твоей любопытной инфопластине в моих покоях".

traits.locale_text: "I am now ready to talk about the intriguing contents of your data-slate — in my quarters."
"I am now ready to talk about the intriguing contents of your data-slate — in my quarters."

"I am ready to talk now about the intriguing contents of your data-slate — in my quarters."
"I am ready to talk now about the intriguing contents of your data-slate — in my quarters."

languages.text: 「君のデータスレートに記されていた興味深い内容について、今なら話せそうだ。{mf|俺|私}の部屋でね」
languages.original_text: "I am ready to talk now about the intriguing contents of your data-slate — in my quarters."

traits.locale_text: 「君のデータスレートに記されていた興味深い内容について、今なら話せそうだ。{mf|俺|私}の部屋でね」

languages.text: "Ich bin jetzt bereit, über den faszinierenden Inhalt Eures Datablocks zu reden – in meinem Quartier."
languages.original_text: "I am ready to talk now about the intriguing contents of your data-slate — in my quarters."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin jetzt bereit, über den faszinierenden Inhalt Eures Datablocks zu reden – in meinem Quartier."

languages.text: « J'aimerais m'entretenir avec vous au sujet des contenus intrigants de votre plaque de données... dans mes quartiers. »
languages.original_text: "I am ready to talk now about the intriguing contents of your data-slate — in my quarters."

traits.locale_text: « J'aimerais m'entretenir avec vous au sujet des contenus intrigants de votre plaque de données... dans mes quartiers. »

languages.text: «Estoy {mf|listo|lista} para comentar el intrigante contenido de su tablilla de datos... en mis aposentos».
languages.original_text: "I am ready to talk now about the intriguing contents of your data-slate — in my quarters."

traits.locale_text: «Estoy {mf|listo|lista} para comentar el intrigante contenido de su tablilla de datos... en mis aposentos».

languages.text: “我准备好了，来谈谈你的数据板那些有趣的内容吧——来我的房间里谈。”
languages.original_text: "I am ready to talk now about the intriguing contents of your data-slate — in my quarters."

traits.locale_text: “我准备好了，来谈谈你的数据板那些有趣的内容吧——来我的房间里谈。”

languages.text: "Databelanın ilgi çekici içeriği hakkında şimdi konuşabiliriz. Kamarama geçelim."
languages.original_text: "I am ready to talk now about the intriguing contents of your data-slate — in my quarters."

traits.locale_text: "Databelanın ilgi çekici içeriği hakkında şimdi konuşabiliriz. Kamarama geçelim."
